block.p: Susan Anne Nappa and Philip St. George Cocke 5th were married on Tuesday in New York. The Rev. Jeffrey White performed the ceremony at the Central Presbyterian Church.

Mrs. Cocke is a regional sales director for Christian Dior Perfumes in New York. She graduated from Rollins College. She is a daughter of Mrs. Edward C. Forbes of Newport, R.I., and Michael C. Nappa of Alpine, N.J. Mr. Nappa, a real estate developer in Alpine, was the owner of Hackensack (N.J.) Ford.
Susan Anne Nappa and Philip St. George Cocke 5th were married on Tuesday in New York. The Rev. Jeffrey White performed the ceremony at the Central Presbyterian Church.

Mrs. Cocke is a regional sales director for Christian Dior Perfumes in New York. She graduated from Rollins College. She is a daughter of Mrs. Edward C. Forbes of Newport, R.I., and Michael C. Nappa of Alpine, N.J. Mr. Nappa, a real estate developer in Alpine, was the owner of Hackensack (N.J.) Ford.
Mr. Cocke, an investment consultant in New York, graduated from the University of Virginia. His previous marriage ended in divorce.
He is a son of Mrs. Cocke 4th of Rappahannock Academy, Va., and the late Colonel Cocke, who was a French interpreter for NATO from its start until he retired in 1963.
